DOC.brief_summary: To find a test to elaborate a parameter for specific immunotherapy in allergic patients
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Trial to Elaborate a Cutaneous Antigen Neutralization Test in Patients Suffering From Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Age between 18 and 65 Signed informed consent SIT 2000/2001 10 patients with SIT with a good result 10 patients with bad results Exclusion criteria: Pregnancy and breastfeeding
